original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 329.35/45 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 329.35/45 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 329.35/50 the previous day, dealers said.
On the Colombo Stock Exchange, the All Share Price Index was up 0.28 percent at 10,481.
The S&P SL20 index was up 0.28 percent at 2,979. Turnover was at 94 million.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 14.20/25 percent from 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 14.25/35 percent from 14.20/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.45/50 percent from 14.40/50 percent. (Colombo/Nov29/2023)
